header.title: Our Services
header.subtitle: Connecting professionals with opportunities worldwide through our comprehensive career services

resumeService.title: Resume Service
resumeService.description: From generating bullet points to automatic formatting, our resume builder will help you make a professional resume quickly and effortlessly.
resumeService.longDesc: Our professional resume writing service helps job seekers create impactful, ATS-friendly resumes that highlight their unique qualifications and increase interview opportunities. We tailor each resume to specific industries and positions.

globalJobPlacement.title: Global Job Placement
globalJobPlacement.description: From personalized job matching to visa support, we connect professionals with top employers across the globeâ€”seamlessly and efficiently.
globalJobPlacement.longDesc: Our global job placement service connects talented professionals with international career opportunities, handling everything from job matching to relocation logistics and cultural preparation.

interviewCoaching.title: Interview Coaching
interviewCoaching.description: From mock interviews to personalized feedback, our comprehensive interview coaching helps professionals land their dream jobs with confidence.
interviewCoaching.longDesc: Our interview coaching prepares candidates to excel in any interview format with customized practice sessions, detailed feedback, and strategies tailored to specific roles and industries.

careerCounselling.title: Career Counselling
careerCounselling.description: From career assessments to personalized development plans, our comprehensive counselling helps professionals find their perfect path with confidence.
careerCounselling.longDesc: Our career counselling service helps professionals at all stages identify their strengths, explore suitable career paths, and develop actionable plans to achieve their professional goals.

visaRelocation.title: Visa & Relocation
visaRelocation.description: From visa applications to settling into your new home, our comprehensive relocation services help you transition to a new country with confidence.
visaRelocation.longDesc: Our visa and relocation services provide comprehensive support through the entire immigration process, from document preparation to finding accommodation and settling into your new environment.

skillDevelopment.title: Skill Development
skillDevelopment.description: From beginner workshops to expert certification, our skill development programs empower professionals to master in-demand skills for tomorrow's opportunities.
skillDevelopment.longDesc: Our skill development programs offer targeted training in high-demand skills, with customized learning paths, practical projects, and certification preparation to boost career advancement.

remoteWorkOpportunities.title: Remote Work Opportunities
remoteWorkOpportunities.description: From remote job matching to home office setup guidance, we help professionals thrive in the virtual workplace with tailored solutions.
remoteWorkOpportunities.longDesc: Our remote work service specializes in connecting professionals with quality remote positions, providing guidance on virtual work tools, and helping establish productive home office environments.

talentAcquisition.title: Talent Acquisition
talentAcquisition.description: From identifying ideal candidates to seamless onboarding, our talent acquisition platform helps organizations build high-performing teams efficiently.
talentAcquisition.longDesc: Our talent acquisition service helps organizations identify, attract, and retain top talent with customized recruitment strategies, candidate assessment, and efficient onboarding processes.

immigration.title: Immigration
immigration.description: From visa applications to permanent residency, our expert immigration consultants will guide you through every step of the process with personalized support.
immigration.longDesc: Our immigration consultants provide expert guidance on all immigration pathways, handling complex documentation, application preparation, and offering ongoing support throughout your immigration journey.

jobRecruitment.title: Job Recruitment
jobRecruitment.description: From sourcing candidates to final placement, our comprehensive recruitment services help businesses find top talent globally with precision and efficiency.
jobRecruitment.longDesc: Our job recruitment service specializes in connecting employers with qualified candidates across various industries, utilizing advanced screening processes and global talent networks to ensure perfect matches.
